thinkpol.server package¶

Submodules¶

thinkpol.server.server module¶

class thinkpol.server.server.Handler(connection, publish)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Handles connection the server gets in a multithreaded way. :param connection: the connection the server gets :type connection: Connection :param publish: the function to which we publish the data :type publish: callable

lock = <unlocked _thread.lock object>¶
run()¶

Handles one client’s request and opens/edits a corresponding file.

thinkpol.server.server.run_server(host, port, publish)¶

Starts receiving connections from clients on host:port, and publishing the data we receive to the function publish.

Parameters

  • host (str) – the host on which we’re listening

  • port (str) – the port on which we’re listening

  • publish (callable) – the function to which we publish the data

thinkpol.server.server_utils module¶

thinkpol.server.server_utils.available_fields()¶

Returns a list of the fields we can currently handle, according to which parsers we currently have.

Returns

a list of the names (strings) of the available fields

Return type

list

thinkpol.server.server_utils.filter_dict(snapshot_dict)¶

Receives a dictionary with snapshot data and returns an updated dict, containing only the fields our parsers can handle.

Parameters

snapshot_dict (dict) – the original dict

Returns

the filtered dict

Return type

dict

thinkpol.server.server_utils.make_snapshot_dict(user, snapshot, c_path, d_path)¶

Gets user and snapshot objects and creates a dict with their corresponding info to be turned into a json and parsed.

Parameters

  • user (cortex_pb2.User) – the user object

  • snapshot (Snapshot) – the snapshot object

  • c_path (str) – the path to the color image

  • d_path (str) – the path to the depth image

Returns

the dict that was created

Return type

dict

thinkpol.server.server_utils.save_images(snapshot)¶

Gets a snapshot, saves the color and depth data in bytes to files on disk, and returns the file paths.

Parameters

snapshot (Snapshot) – the snapshot from which we get the data

Returns

a 2-tuple - (color_image_path, depth_image_path)

Return type

tuple

Module contents¶

Receives data about users and snapshots of their cognition from clients and sends it to parsing functions that parse that data and use it in various ways.

Thinkpol
